attributes.action: Confirm Nigel Farage will never represent British people for the UK Government.
attributes.additional_details:
Donald J. Trump ‏@realDonaldTrump  22/11/2016
Many people would like to see @Nigel_Farage represent Great Britain as their Ambassador to the United States. He would do a great job!
attributes.background: US president-elect Trump has issued a statement suggesting that Nigel Farage would make a good UK ambassador to the US. Mr Farage's views and opinions are so out of line with mainstream UK society that any appointment would be unrepresentative of the UK inclusive people and multi-cultural society.
